gui.panels

Class GridPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.panels.GridPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GridPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The Class GridPanel. This Panel is drawn over image to show the grid. Draws lines of grid and grey boxes on unselected grid cells.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
